GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v6.1.9
GSD.description:
HID: intel_ish-hid: Add check for ishtp_dma_tx_map

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.9 by commit 9a65e90179ba06eb299badc3e4dc4aa2b1e35af3, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit 3703f53b99e4a7c373ce3568dd3f91f175ebb626. For more details please see the references link.
